def spot_diff(s1, s2):
  return [i for i in range(len(s1)) if s1[i] != s2[i]]

def spot_diff(s1, s2):
    return [k for k in range(len(s1)) if s1[k] != s2[k]]

def spot_diff(s1, s2):
    return [i for i, (x, y) in enumerate(zip(s1, s2)) if x != y]

def spot_diff(s1, s2):
    return [i for i, (a, b) in enumerate(zip(s1, s2)) if a != b]
spot_diff = lambda a,b: [i for i,j in enumerate(zip(a,b)) if j[0]!=j[1]]

def spot_diff(s1, s2):
    return [i for i, a in enumerate(zip(s1, s2)) if a[0] != a[1]]

def spot_diff(s1, s2):
  return [index for index, (c1, c2) in enumerate(zip(s1, s2)) if c1 != c2]
